name: Silian Rail
description:
Silian Rail is a game about earning the finest Business Card in town; President of Pierce & Pierce.

Through lies and deceit, you must search the office for rumors about fellow employees... then take them down by smearing their reputation with said rumors. You'll be sure to get that promotion!

Be careful though, as your immoral actions can literally backfire against you.

Silian Rail is part action, part bullet hell, and even feels a little stealthy (despite no stealth mechanics).

Aim for the top!

Made for Ludum Dare 31 "Entire Game on One Screen"
Please vote here if you have time: Silian Rail on Ludum Dare
